The first instance of "tubulointerstitial nephritis" refers to a specific type of kidney disease characterized by inflammation in the tubules and interstitium. The second instance of "gentamicin-induced tubulointerstitial nephritis" refers to a specific type of kidney disease that is caused by the drug gentamicin.
